original_title: Inhaling the Spore: A Journey Through the Museum of Jurassic Technology
overview: Documentary - A fascinating look into an obscure institution, this documentary visits the Museum of Jurassic Technology in Culver City, Calif. Comprising a collection of exhibits, dioramas and curios -- most of which seemingly have nothing to do with the Jurassic period or technology -- the museum offers an intellectual trip down the rabbit hole. The film includes interviews with founder and curator David Wilson and an extensive tour of the museum's oddities. -
title: Inhaling the Spore: A Journey Through the Museum of Jurassic Technology
